Kerisma Understanding Women
COMPASSION BLENDED WITH EXPERTISE
Providing healthcare for women requires a special touch. You do so much for other people, your family, your coworkers, your friends. Taking care of others starts with taking care of yourself, and that means identifying quality care for your health needs.
Our mission is to promote health and prevent disease in women by providing all women who come to us with the highest quality care and with the information needed to make knowledgeable decisions about their health. Because a woman's gynecological health needs constantly change throughout her life, our team of medical professionals work together to diagnose, educate, support and treat a wide spectrum of conditions for all phases of life. Our commitment to providing compassionate, personalized care places Understanding Women on the leading edge of women's healthcare.
We understand that you're busy and we value your time. That's why we've made it a priority to make your visits with us as convenient as possible. At Understanding Women, we can perform your bone density scans, ultrasounds and gynecological exams in one appointment.
Take care of yourself and call us today.
Laser Stretch Mark Treatment Treat stretch marks in just a few easy laser treatments with no downtime. Stretch marks are an unfortunate fact of life. Finally, there's an FDA-approved treatment that helps give you the clear, smooth, touchable skin you've been dreaming of. Learn more...
BT Test&Early Breast Cancer Detection When detected and treated in its early stages, breast cancer carries a 96% survival rate, yet the disease kills more women than any other form of cancer. The BT Test is a screening blood test making history as a reliable marker for the early detection of breast cancer. It is not a genetic test evaluating for risk of getting breast cancer, the BT Test analyzes for the actual presence or absence of breast cancer by looking for unique proteins.

Kerisma Center For Medical Aesthetics Now Offers Facethefuture Lift - For The Treatment Of The Aging Face.
Phoenix-, AZÂ August 20, 2011 - Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics, a Phoenix, Arizona clinical facility that provides a number of aesthetic procedures under the guidance of owner and medical director, Dr. Keri Sweeten, is the first aesthetic center in the state to offer FACETHEFUTUREI Lift for facial rejuvenation.
We used to dream of the day we could remove fat with liposuction and then transfer that fat to other parts of the body to augment certain areas or correct many early signs of aging, such as fat shifting, fat descent or fat loss. Patients today are seeking to rejuvenate all 3 components. That modern miracle is here. Dr Sweeten dubs the fat-transfer procedure FaceTheFutureI Lift. We use fat as a volumizing agent, because it's the volume that makes one look younger and adipose stems cells are regenerative so you look better with time. Now, thanks to FACETHEFUTUREI Lift, the team at Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics can lift the brow, restore fullness to the cheeks, straighten noses and plump lips. Basically, anywhere that you lose fat, it can be replaced - even ear lobes. FACETHEFUTUREI Lift will quickly have patients looking more youthful with little downtime!
The traditional facelift technique is outdated. The new FACETHEFUTUREI Lift uses fat-grafting/stem cells through microinjection that may just well be the most revolutionary procedure to come along for the treatment of the aging face in the last decade. It is safe and replaces the needed material with the body's own source.
Keri Sweeten, MD, owner and Medical Director of Kerisma and a cosmetic surgeon specializing in full body aesthetic applications believes FACETHEFUTUREI Lift is the ideal solution for the treatment of face aging signs: "When it is your own fat it cannot be rejected. It should last indefinitely because it is a living part of you. It helps set back the clock by restoring the 3 dimensional character of your face, helping to eliminate that fake, pulled, taut surgical appearance of traditional lifting alone so you should continue to age like a younger person. But it's not just about the volume. The adipose stem cells are responsible for nurturing the fat cells and even take part in improving the skin over time by building and renewing the collagen matrix. The impact of having stem cells in the fat will advance healing and change medicine forever"
Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics is the first aesthetic center in Arizona to use the latest state-of-the-art technologies to harvest and concentrate the stem-cell enriched fat - the Adivive LipoKit. This is the first FDA-approved all-in-one device that maximizes the ratio of stem cells to fat for autologous fat transfer. This new technology improves the efficiency of this procedure to isolate the regenerative properties of stem cells that are within the fat. As an added benefit, because the prepared fat is rich with stem cells, it can also be used for several specific areas such as aging hands, defects/deformities, joints, and a breast or buttock lift with great success.
Who is a good candidate for this procedure? This procedure is ideal for anyone desiring a youthful appearance. Below are some of the determining factors:
â¢Patients that appear older than their age â¢Patients that have bags and/or hollows under their eyes â¢Patients with deep smile and marionette lines â¢Patients that appear more "tired," sunken, or deflated than they would like â¢Patients with hands that give away their age
In summary, FACETHEFUTUREI Lift is a non-surgical facelift used to correct laxity to create a more youthful appearance. It is a great alternative to going "under the knife." Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics is one of the first cosmetic surgical centers in the United States to use Adivive - the new autologous fat transfer technology and now offers a complimentary consultation with a medical professional to discuss individual goals and recommend the appropriate treatment.
To learn more about Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics and this procedure including the latest clinical data and before-and-after photos, please visit www.KerismaMedSpa.com.
Kerisma Center for Medical Aesthetics is located in Phoenix, Arizona and specializes in providing professional treatments to meet all your aesthetic needs. The Center includes the most gracious, caring and knowledgeable staff delivering a complete menu of options for our aesthetic patients, including Laser Hair Removal, Photo Facial, Fractional laser stretch mark removal, AWAKE Breast Augmentation and The Aussie Makeover, the most private makeover for down under.

All services are provided under the guidance of owner and medical director, Dr. Keri Sweeten. Dr. Sweeten is well-known in the Valley of the Sun for providing women with the safe, effective quality-of-life procedures they want and need.
